## a Plotly plot. Thank you

```{r fig.align='center', out.width="90%", fig.asp = 0.7, message = FALSE}
library(plotly)
set.seed(2016-07-21)
temp <- rnorm(100, mean = 30, sd = 5)
pressue <- rnorm(100)
dtime <- 1:100
plot_ly(x = ~temp, y = ~pressue, z = ~dtime,
        type = "scatter3d", color = ~temp)
```
